'''Mysterious Grimoire''' is an exploration mechanic in [[Nostoi Region]], [[Fontaine]]. Use [[Symphony]] to make them stop in mid-air and place them in [[A Mysterious Bookshelf Full of Grimoires|mysterious bookshelves]].
